sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
amuses someone
se človek tistemu želi nasmehniti ali zasmejati.

seg.quote: He laughed as if the idea amused him.
I was highly amused by a comment Shaw made.

sense.def:
To amuse oneself
ali
to amuse someone
pomeni početi nekaj, da nam ali drugemu človeku čas mine in ni dolgčas.

seg.quote: Sam amused himself by throwing branches into the fire.
